articles.title: CS:GO is still breaking records over a decade after its original release - Dot Esports
articles.description: One of the greatest games in PC history is still pushing upward.
articles.content: Although it’s been 11 years since CS:GO was released, the popular first-person shooter hasn’t slowed down with its loyal player base, leading all titles in active users over the past few months. The … [+1619 chars]
